arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim confirms Andre Onana news ahead of Fulham vs Man United
arts.sum: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim has shed light on his decision to start Altay Bayindir ahead of Andre Onana, confirming that the choice was purely a technical one. The move raised eyebrows before kick-off, with Onana dropping to the bench, but Amorim insisted it was part of his responsibility as manager to make difficult calls […] The post Ruben Amorim confirms Andre Onana news ahead of Fulham vs Man United appeared first on CaughtOffside.
